summary: This bill, H.R. 3120, aims to improve the review and effectiveness of cost of living adjustments (COLA) for military personnel and Department of Defense civilian employees stationed in California's 19th Congressional District. It calls for a report evaluating the current COLA calculation methods, considering factors like high-cost areas and the impact of military commissaries. The report, to be submitted by the Under Secretary of Defense for Personnel and Readiness, will assess the accuracy of existing COLA methodologies and suggest potential improvements to ensure adequate financial support for personnel in the specified area.
